title: Amelia Gentleman on her husband Jo Johnson: 'We keep our professional lives separate. He hasn't even read my book'
text:
Amelia, 47, is a journalist and the author of The Windrush Betrayal. Her husband is the politician Jo Johnson, and she is the sister-in-law of the Prime Minister. She lives in London with Jo and their two children

I grew up in Camden, north London – I was the third of four children and I inherited a lot of books from my older sisters. Whenever we went on holiday, my parents didn’t arrange activities for us, we read instead. They also took me to the local library once a week. It’s not far from where I live now, so I take my children. It smells the same – of lino and floor polish.

My father David, an artist, had a studio above my childhood bedroom and as I lay in bed, I’d hear the floorboards...
description: Amelia, 47, is a journalist and the author of The Windrush Betrayal.
